quote_last: , I will officially welcome our guest of honor. My speech will last for three minutes, and on the first stroke of twelve, Her Majesty will name the Buckingham with the traditional breaking of a magnum of champagne on the hull.”
title: Be Careful What You Wish For
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: By the time that it only wanted
quote_last: , the droll object in question was perceived to be a very diminutive foreign-looking young man. He descended the hills at a great rate, so that every body soon had a good look at him.
title: The Devil in the Belfry
author: Edgar Allan Poe
